Title: Provides a one hundred dollar per day credit to customers of electric and gas corporations for power outages of twenty-four hours or more
Summary: Provides a one hundred dollar per day credit to customers of electric and gas corporations for power outages of twenty-four hours or more.
LawCode: Add ยง73-b, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to providing a one hundred dollar per day credit to customers of electric and gas corporations for power outages of twenty-four hours or more
